tv.freewheel.ad.interfaces

Interface ICTSAdContext

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IAdContext, IParameterHolder

    public interface ICTSAdContext
extends IAdContext
    ICTSAdContext instances are used as ad contexts for CTS SSAI integration.

    See also IAdManager.newCTSContext()

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void setDelegate(ICTSDelegate delegate)
      Set the delegate for the ad context.
